attributes.action: allow council tax payers to opt in/out of services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Council tax to be reduced to cover basic shared council services such as streetlights, housing, refuse centres,  etc which do not directly affect individuals, and allow council tax payers to opt in/out of selective services such as fire service, education, waste collection, etc where the public can buy their own services elsewhere.
